content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: QNAM
      operator: non_empty
    - context: RDOMAIN
      name: QNAM
      operator: exists
      value: variable_name
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0314
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when SUPP--.QNAM presents in dataset, but value of SUPP--.QNAM
  ^= any variable name defined in the corresponding SDTM version.
Outcome:
  Message: SUPP--.QNAM presents in dataset, but value of SUPP--.QNAM ^= any variable
    name defined in the corresponding SDTM version.
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Variable
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0314
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The SDTM allows for the inclusion of a sponsor's non-SDTM
                  variables using the Supplemental Qualifiers special-purpose dataset
                  structure
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: NA
                Section: '2.5'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when SUPP--.QNAM presents in dataset, but value of SUPP--.QNAM ^= any variable name defined in the corresponding SDTM version.

Outcome.Message: SUPP--.QNAM presents in dataset, but value of SUPP--.QNAM ^= any variable name defined in the corresponding SDTM version.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The SDTM allows for the inclusion of a sponsor's non-SDTM variables using the Supplemental Qualifiers special-purpose dataset structure
